subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Alexander Ovechkin scored twice Wednesday night, including his N.H.L.-leading 54th goal, in the Capitals’ 3-1 victory over the Sabres in a key Eastern Conference playoff-race matchup in Buffalo.
snippet: Alexander Ovechkin scored twice Wednesday night, including his N.H.L.-leading 54th goal, in the Capitals’ 3-1 victory over the Sabres in a key Eastern Conference playoff-race matchup in Buffalo.
